text: Cyrill Demian (1772â€“1849) was an Austrian-Armenian inventor, Organ maker, and piano maker who on May 6, 1829, along with his sons Karl and Guido, would patent the accordion. This patent would later be granted on May 23, 1829. == References == Category:1772 births Category:1849 deaths Category:Inventors Category:Austrian people
title: Cyrill Demian
